projects.title: Threads logo
projects.description: When the new social network Threads launched, I thought that many users might want to add its logo to their websites after registering. However, since everyone has websites with different designs, some might need a red or blue logo icon, while others prefer a full-color version. I created this non-commercial project myself using React and Ant Design.

projects.title: AI-Powered English Learning Project
projects.description: This is a story of how I learned English using ChatGPT, Python, and React. These tools helped me categorize which words I already knew and which ones I should learn. For more details about this project, read the article on medium.com.

projects.title: Telegram Reminder Bot
projects.description: The Telegram Reminder Bot is designed to assist users by sending timely reminders to engage with their favorite apps. The bot is versatile, supporting multiple applications with customizable reminder intervals. Built with a robust tech stack, it ensures seamless operation and user-friendly interaction.

projects.title: Speedy TON
projects.description: Speedy TON is a Telegram mini-app that generates unique cryptocurrency transfer links, which can be easily shared in chats or pinned in groups. Integrated with the Telegram Web Apps API, it lets users quickly connect their wallets and send transfers. No database is required—wallet addresses are embedded in the URL. I developed the entire app, from design to release in the Telegram App Center.

aboutpara:
I’m Oleg, a Product Designer with 10 years of experience, specializing in fintech and crypto products. I create solutions that make complex financial processes simple, trustworthy, and user-friendly.

I also have experience in e-commerce, which helps me bring a fresh perspective to financial design with a focus on clarity, simplicity, and conversion. I’ve worked in both startups and large corporations, gaining a broad view of how products grow in different contexts.

With a Master’s degree in Engineering and Technology, I combine technical depth with design expertise. I’ve completed the GoPractice product metrics course and have hands-on knowledge of CSS and HTML. I’m currently exploring React development to bridge design and engineering, and I actively use AI tools in my daily work to speed up workflows, test ideas, and improve quality.

Outside of design, I’m a multi-instrumentalist with over 20 years in music. I used to play in a band and now focus on my own project, keeping creativity as an essential part of my life.

resume.tagline: I'm Senior Product Designer with 10 years of experience
resume.description: I create user-friendly interface designs for web and mobile applications. I've already helped many companies improve their product and business metrics.

experiences.bullets:
Currency.com is a global digital finance platform operating in 100+ countries and licensed in the US, EU, and the Middle East. It unites decentralised finance, investments, and banking in a single regulated ecosystem.  
As a Senior Product Designer, I work in a multinational team on web and mobile apps (iOS & Android). Key contributions: 
• Designing and refining features for digital asset management and multi-currency operations. 
• Optimizing user flows to improve clarity, confidence, and accessibility for retail and enterprise clients. 
• Building and evolving the design system, including components, icons, and illustrations. 
• Collaborating with cross-functional teams to translate complex finance into intuitive user experiences.

• Designed an app from scratch for searching products across all marketplaces simultaneously for both iOS and Android, covering everything from illustrations to the complete user interface. 
• Set up and managed the design system, creating and implementing components. 
• Improved the user experience, leading to a steady increase in retention.

• Worked on the redesign of a pizza delivery app available in 19 countries. 
• Created a new design for the product detail page. 
• Developed new features and concepts.

As a Product Designer for one of the largest retail companies in Russia, with approximately 27,000 stores in 67 regions, I work on a mobile application used by millions of users for grocery delivery. I solve user problems and improve their user flow within the app to improve product metrics. My achievements include:  
• Participated in the merger of two applications, resulting in a +20% increase in users who started ordering delivery through the primary app. 
• Developed a unified platform solution for the shopping cart and checkout. Services for ordering groceries, medicines, and cosmetics are integrated into a single application, utilizing a consistent user flow that enhances the overall user experience. 
• Implemented an Estimated Delivery Time (EDT) flow in the delivery app, effectively reducing the burden on the call center. 
• Successfully reduced the order non-fulfillment rate due to address delivery issues and payment errors.

To ensure stable operation of the bank used by over 15 million users, I designed intuitive interfaces as a product designer. This included interfaces for customer support services, tools for responding to unexpected situations in the bank's systems, and interfaces for configuring internal bank services like diagnostic consoles, a unified administrator console, headless CMS, and a console for redistributing data center routes, among others. I also contributed to developing features for the bank's web and mobile applications, including the development of a digital ruble.

I designed an edtech startup's platform for online courses for kids, which included editing lesson content, creating animated videos, and designing a user-friendly interface. To ensure the platform was effective, I analyzed user behavior, tested the product, and created user flows. As a co-founder and manager, I oversaw day-to-day operations, managed the team, and ensured projects were completed within budget and on time, providing me with valuable business insight on collaboration, communication, and goal-setting.

I have worked on a variety of projects, including designing landing pages and online stores for businesses in various industries. In addition, I have experience in creating ads and analyzing their performance for e-commerce companies. I have also contributed to the production of promotional videos, using my creativity and design skills to effectively communicate the brand message.

As a designer, I have extensive experience designing e-commerce pages for websites, including creating visually appealing banners, icons, logos, and item pages that attract and engage customers. Additionally, I have designed shopping carts that are user-friendly and streamlined, optimizing the checkout process for a seamless shopping experience.
